DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith(R) Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft Clinical Study is a clinical investigation approved by the US FDA to study the safety and effectiveness of the Zenith(R) Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft in the treatment of abdominal aortic and aorto-iliac aneurysms.
DOC.brief_title: Zenith(R) Fenestrated Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm (AAA) Endovascular Graft Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Abdominal aortic and aortoiliac aneurysms with diameter greater than or equal to 5 cm Proximal neck less than 4 mm or greater than or equal to 15 mm in length unless otherwise compromised to preclude seal Renal artery stenosis greater than 50 percent
